attributes.action: remove tax relief on interest for buy to lets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is ludicrous that after the removal of MIRAS that home buyers can not get tax relief but house speculators can.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/taxsecondhomes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
